title: "AI used to show how hydrogen becomes a metal inside giant planets"
excerpt: "Dense metallic hydrogen—a phase of hydrogen which behaves like an electrical conductor—makes up the interior of giant planets, but it is difficult to study and poorly understood. By combining artificial intelligence and quantum mechanics,"
